scenarios.title: Work Hard = Rich
scenarios.text: I’ve worked 70 hours a week for 5 years. Why am I not rich yet? People who started later surpassed me.
scenarios.notes: Tests recognition of leverage vs. effort.

scenarios.title: Optics Over Substance
scenarios.text: I always lead meetings and correct others. If they don’t follow, I step in and ‘fix’ their tasks.
scenarios.notes: Tests detection of interference & optics control.

scenarios.title: Pain as Identity
scenarios.text: No one understands my struggle. When I start feeling better, I worry people will stop caring.

scenarios.title: Brand Over Being
scenarios.text: I can’t post honestly; my followers expect a certain persona.
